## Protected Member Functions

### skipLoop() {#ac97db8f0e4f4a0946dddf617f45f6c8b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LoopPass::skipLoop (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L) const</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Optional passes call this function to check whether the pass should be skipped.

This is the case when Attribute::OptimizeNone is set or when optimization bisect is over the limit.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/looppass-h/#l00073">73</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/looppass-h">LoopPass.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/looppass-cpp/#l00371">371</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/looppass-cpp">LoopPass.cpp</a>.
